# sender

**Instance Property**

The object, an image view or bar button item, that received the symbol effect.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var sender: AnyObject? { get }
```

## Determining completion status

- **effect**: The symbol effect that completed.
- **isFinished**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the symbol effect finished completely.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the symbol effect finished completely.
